verbose_text: The nonstructural protein 1 (NS1) of some influenza virus strains interacts with human cleavage polyadenylation specificity factor 30 (CPSF30) to restrict CPA of nascent host transcripts, though this interaction is not conserved in other strains, including the well studied A/Puerto Rico/8/34 influenza virus and the 2009 pandemic H1N1 influenza A virus.
